education.institution: St. Joseph's Higher Secondary School, Trivandrum

experience.title: Software Developer
description: Developed REST APIs in Python (FastAPI) with PostgreSQL and Firebase for user authorization, data exchange, and cloud service allocation.

Optimized SQL queries and application logic, cutting API response times by 90% and improving the user experience for 1,000+ data scientists and engineers accessing cloud services and generative AI through the platform.
Implemented secure user sign-up with OTP verification and reCAPTCHA, and strengthened application security through multifactor authentication (MFA).
Took end-to-end ownership of features, executed swift bug resolutions, and provided guidance to developers throughout development, deployment, and maintenance.

experience.title: Software Developer, Data Engineering
description: Designed and developed scalable APIs using FastAPI as part of a large-scale microservices architecture, with deployment on Google Cloud Platform and comprehensive unit test coverage.
Prototyped a fully automated data migration pipeline using AWS S3, Snowflake, Google BigQuery, Apache Airflow, and PySpark for seamless data movement and transformation.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Built a token-staking platform backend for cryptocurrency exchange on the Solana blockchain, using Rust.
Developed a decentralized API to support user authentication on the Internet Computer blockchain, using Motoko.

main.title: Backend
main.description: Worked on microservices with FastAPI, and also built projects using Django. Comfortable with advanced SQL and tuning APIs for speed.

main.title: Frontend
main.description: Built responsive web applications using React, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS etc. (this site included).

main.title: Cloud
main.description: Google Cloud Certified. Worked with GCP APIs, Cloud Functions, VMs etc. Tinkered with AWS services like S3, Lambda, Redshift etc.

main.title: App
main.description: Developed mobile apps with Android Studio and React Native (Expo).

main.title: Data
main.description: Learned how to design data pipelines with Apache Airflow, Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift, etc. Picked up basics of data processing in Pandas and PySpark.

projects.title: Expert System
description: A user interface enabling the complete creation of a machine learning pipeline—including data preprocessing, modeling, and evaluation—without writing any code.

Enables users to upload datasets, select from 13 algorithms and generate models directly from the platform, increasing accessibility to ML for over 95% of internet users without any programming knowledge.

Allows users to visualize data, cleanup and prepare data for modelling, build ML models, evaluate their performance, make predictions, download the generated models and seamlessly integrate them into their own projects.

projects.title: Solana Vault
description: A decentralized token staking platform built on the Solana blockchain using the Anchor framework.

Implemented features for depositing and withdrawing tokens (SOL & SPL), automated minting and distribution of tokens as rewards, managing vault operations and stringent security protocols to protect user data and transactions.
Integrated unit tests in TypeScript to systematically verify application logic, ensuring accurate behavior.

certifications.title: Harvard University CS50W - Web Programming with Python and JavaScript
Chennai Mathematical Institute Programming, Data Structures and Algorithms in Python

achievements.description: Scored 99.54 percentile in UGC NET (Computer Science), 2025 — ranked among the top 200 nationwide.
Rated 1800+ (Knight) on LeetCode, ranked in the top 5% globally, with 750+ problems solved.
Ranked 1st in college during undergraduate and 3rd in college during postgraduate.
Achieved Rank 20 in the Kerala MCA Entrance Examination, 2023.
Obtained an All India Rank of 1778 in the IIT JAM (Joint Admission Test for Masters) Mathematics, 2023.
